content.text: {"translationLines":[{"lineNumber":75691,"originalJapaneseLine":"　家に帰ってシィルのへんでろぱ、","translatedEnglishLine":"Back home, I started craving Sheila's hemp."},{"lineNumber":75692,"originalJapaneseLine":"　食いたくなってきた）","translatedEnglishLine":"I really wanted to eat it."},{"lineNumber":75693,"originalJapaneseLine":"「……おい、シィル」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"...Hey, Sheila.\""},{"lineNumber":75694,"originalJapaneseLine":"「は、はい？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Y-yes?\""},{"lineNumber":75695,"originalJapaneseLine":"「いいな、勝手に死ぬんじゃないぞ。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Listen, don’t just go dying on me without permission."},{"lineNumber":75696,"originalJapaneseLine":"　それは俺様が許さんからな」","translatedEnglishLine":"I won’t allow that.\""},{"lineNumber":75697,"originalJapaneseLine":"「……はい」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"...Yes.\""},{"lineNumber":75698,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ランス様も……死なないで下さい……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Lance-sama... please don’t die...\""},{"lineNumber":75699,"originalJapaneseLine":"「馬鹿、俺様が死ぬか」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Fool, like I’m going to die.\""},{"lineNumber":75700,"originalJapaneseLine":"「だがまあ、何があるか分からんしな」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"But well, you never know what might happen.\""},{"lineNumber":75701,"originalJapaneseLine":"「えっ！？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Eh!?\""},{"lineNumber":75702,"originalJapaneseLine":"「もしかしたら俺も、と……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Maybe I too...\""},{"lineNumber":75703,"originalJapaneseLine":"　そういうこともあるかも知れんな」","translatedEnglishLine":"That kind of thing might happen too.\""},{"lineNumber":75704,"originalJapaneseLine":"「そ、そんな……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Th-that's...\""},{"lineNumber":75705,"originalJapaneseLine":"「馬鹿、例えばの話だ」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Idiot, it’s just a hypothetical.\""},{"lineNumber":75706,"originalJapaneseLine":"「……こんなこと言ったなんて、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"...Don't tell anyone else I said something like this,"},{"lineNumber":75707,"originalJapaneseLine":"　他の奴には言うなよ。","translatedEnglishLine":"Don’t say it to anyone else."},{"lineNumber":75708,"originalJapaneseLine":"　格好悪いからな」","translatedEnglishLine":"It’s embarrassing.\""},{"lineNumber":75709,"originalJapaneseLine":"「…………」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"........\""},{"lineNumber":75710,"originalJapaneseLine":"「もし……その時は……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"If... that time comes...\""},{"lineNumber":75711,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あん？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Huh?\""},{"lineNumber":75712,"originalJapaneseLine":"　","translatedEnglishLine":""},{"lineNumber":75713,"originalJapaneseLine":"　　＜ぎゅっ……＞","translatedEnglishLine":"<Squeeze...>"},{"lineNumber":75714,"originalJapaneseLine":"シィルがランスの頭を優しく抱きしめた。","translatedEnglishLine":"Sheila gently embraced Lance’s head."},{"lineNumber":75715,"originalJapaneseLine":"「私も、ついていきます……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"I will follow you too...\""},{"lineNumber":75716,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ついてくって……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Follow... you say...?\""},{"lineNumber":75717,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ついて……いきます……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"I will... follow you...\""},{"lineNumber":75718,"originalJapaneseLine":"「俺、結構悪いことしてるから、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Because I’ve done quite a lot of bad things,"},{"lineNumber":75719,"originalJapaneseLine":"　地獄行きかも知れんぞ」","translatedEnglishLine":"I might go to hell.\""},{"lineNumber":75720,"originalJapaneseLine":"「……絶対、ついていきます……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"...I will definitely follow you...\""},{"lineNumber":75721,"originalJapaneseLine":"「…………ふん、当然だ」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"...Hmph, obviously.\""},{"lineNumber":75722,"originalJapaneseLine":"「死んでも何してもお前は俺の奴隷だからな」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Dead or alive, you are my slave.\""},{"lineNumber":75723,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ただし、俺はお前が死んでも","translatedEnglishLine":"\"However, if you die,"},{"lineNumber":75724,"originalJapaneseLine":"　ついていったりしてやらんぞ」","translatedEnglishLine":"I won’t be following you.\""},{"lineNumber":75725,"originalJapaneseLine":"「はい……それでも、構いません……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Yes... even so, that's fine...\""},{"lineNumber":75726,"originalJapaneseLine":"「……ふん」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"...Hmph.\""},{"lineNumber":75727,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あ、あの……ランス様……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Um... Lance-sama...\""},{"lineNumber":75728,"originalJapaneseLine":"「なんだ？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"What is it?\""},{"lineNumber":75729,"originalJapaneseLine":"「……あ、いえ、すみません……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"...Ah, no, sorry... "},{"lineNumber":75730,"originalJapaneseLine":"　なんでも、ありません……」","translatedEnglishLine":"It’s nothing...\""},{"lineNumber":75731,"originalJapaneseLine":"「言ったら……きっと、ランス様怒るから……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"If I said it... Lance-sama would definitely get angry...\""},{"lineNumber":75732,"originalJapaneseLine":"「……なら黙ってろ。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"...Then keep quiet."},{"lineNumber":75733,"originalJapaneseLine":"　いい加減、寝るぞ」","translatedEnglishLine":"It’s about time to sleep.\""},{"lineNumber":75734,"originalJapaneseLine":"「はい……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Yes...\""},{"lineNumber":75735,"originalJapaneseLine":"　","translatedEnglishLine":""},{"lineNumber":75736,"originalJapaneseLine":"　　＜ギュッ……＞","translatedEnglishLine":"<Squeeze...>"},{"lineNumber":75737,"originalJapaneseLine":"シィルは優しく、それでも強く、","translatedEnglishLine":"Sheila gently, yet firmly,"},{"lineNumber":75738,"originalJapaneseLine":"ランスを抱きしめた。","translatedEnglishLine":"embraced Lance."},{"lineNumber":75739,"originalJapaneseLine":"（ランス様……大好き、です……）","translatedEnglishLine":"(Lance-sama... I love you...)"},{"lineNumber":75740,"originalJapaneseLine":"（だから……どうかご無事で……）","translatedEnglishLine":"(So... please be safe... )"}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 家に帰ってシィルのへんでろぱ、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Back home, I started craving Sheila's hemp.
I really wanted to eat it.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「いいな、勝手に死ぬんじゃないぞ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Listen, don’t just go dying on me without permission.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: それは俺様が許さんからな」
「ランス様も……死なないで下さい……」
「だがまあ、何があるか分からんしな」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "But well, you never know what might happen."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そういうこともあるかも知れんな」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: That kind of thing might happen too."
"...Don't tell anyone else I said something like this,
Don’t say it to anyone else.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: シィルがランスの頭を優しく抱きしめた。
「俺、結構悪いことしてるから、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Because I’ve done quite a lot of bad things,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 地獄行きかも知れんぞ」
「死んでも何してもお前は俺の奴隷だからな」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Dead or alive, you are my slave."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ただし、俺はお前が死んでも
ついていったりしてやらんぞ」
「言ったら……きっと、ランス様怒るから……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "If I said it... Lance-sama would definitely get angry..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: シィルは優しく、それでも強く、

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English
